name: Dark Case Canvas
description: Save your eyes with a darker theme for Case Western Reserve University's Canvas Portal.
additional_info:
Latest update - 9/17/2021 - Improvement to readability on some assignments. 

Canvas is partially styled using JavaScript, so there are some things I can't style with just CSS.
Email me at pgz@case.edu if you notice any accessibility issues.

-Phineas Ziegler
